title: Fantasy
lyrics:
I've given you no reason
Just the silent treatment
While I've given myself the benefit of my own doubt
For it's far too way from crying
Living and slowly dying
Despite all our efforts to shut it down



I've never seen someone like you

The one that I've made you into



I want you to come closer

Maybe treat me better

Maybe a little meaner

Does it take work?

I hate when you can resist me

Don't step on my fantasy

Don't come to life

Don't come to life

Don't come alive



In the comfort of my daydream

You're everything that I need

Even when you're back in your local time

We expand into an ocean

A story unspoken

And my name is always in the pipeline



I've never seen someone like you

The one that I've made you into



I want you to come closer

Maybe treat me better

Maybe a little meaner

Does it take work?

I hate when you can resist me

Don't step on my fantasy

Don't come to life

Don't come to life

Don't come alive



I want you to come closer, closer, closer

I want you to come closer, closer, closer



I want you to come closer

Maybe treat me better

Maybe a little meaner

Does it take work?

I hate when you can resist me

Don't step on my fantasy

Don't come to life

Don't come to life

Don't come alive
